description: Development of high quality production features and supporting infrastructure. Leveraging empathy for the client to understand problems thoroughly, and experience to design appropriate technical solutions.

Writes blog posts about Ankorstore that receive moderate traffic
Built a durable, long-standing org relationship with Code2040

steps.description: Establishes Ankorstore as a great, innovative company and workplace to the whole industry
examples: Establishes themself as an industry thought leader who attracts talent
Published a paper on Ankorstore technology in a peer-reviewed journal
Publishes material about Ankorstore's organizational or technical innovations
Authored joint-press release with EFF on DNT Leverages significant following to evangelise Ankorstore
Published 'Why Content Editable Is Terrible' on the Ankorstore engineering blog

steps.description: Introduces Ankorstore in a positive light to a wider audience outside the industry
examples: Delivers key messages to broad, mainstream audiences
Published or interviewed in a mainstream newspaper or website outside tech
Influences people with large audiences to talk about Ankorstore positively
Keynoted a conference with international attention
Drives recognition and adoption of Ankorstore in significant numbers
Represented Ankorstore in national televised media

tracks.description: Strengthens Ankorstore's team by bringing in excellent staff members

steps.description: Brings new candidates into the pipeline and understands how to evaluate candidates at Ankorstore
examples: Reviews existing network for hiring leads regularly
Completed interview calibration
Shadows interviews to gain familiarity with process
Set up casual sessions to practice asking questions
Reviews current job postings regularly
Referred appropriate individuals for open positions

steps.description: Interviews regularly, helps the team make meaningful hiring decisions, and helps build a diverse pipeline
examples: Uses scorecard to provide clear, objective feedback on candidates
Added observable evidence for every rating
Interviews candidates with empathy and treats them all with equal respect
Started a monthly brunch for candidates to meet Ankorstore employees
Researches approaches for sourcing candidates and diversifying hiring
Tested a new service for quality and diversity of candidates

steps.description: Maintains and strengthens the integrity of the current process, and regularly brings in great candidates
examples: Teaches new interviewers how to interview with empathy
Wrote new interview question which meets our question quality criteria
Models great interview technique and feedback when shadowed
Brought candidates into our pipeline proactively, with a high conversion rate
Reverse shadows trainees and helps calibrate their feedback
Proposed useful, tangible improvements to the interview process

steps.description: Actively contributes to and leads hiring decisions, and goes to great lengths to source great candidates
examples: Documents subtle cues in interviews that indicate values alignment
Planned engineering summit on interview process and training
Makes hiring decisions, resolving discrepancies between conflicting reports
Organized and lead Ankorstore's presence at a recruitment fair
Top-grades candidates and teases out character traits
Started Code2040 internship program

steps.description: Sets recruitment strategy, invests in long-term relationships for critical roles, and recruits at scale
examples: Sets the tone, policy and goals around building a diverse, high-quality team
Talked with a senior candidate over many months to fill a critical role
Identifies and brings in promising acquisitions
Organized efforts around convincing acquired engineers to join and stay
Tracks industry activity, identifying opportunities for critical roles
Set goals, then tracked and reported metrics on team demographics over time

tracks.description: Builds community internally, gives of themself to the team, and champions and extols company values

steps.description: Is available and present on current teams, and works to contribute positively to company culture
examples: Participates in team activities and offsites
Joined and actively participated in the web client guild
Treats colleagues and clients with respect
Brought a small gift back from vacation for the team
Joins groups or committees outside regular duties
Wrote entertaining and informative Prod Ops writeups on Hatch

steps.description: Steps up, builds connectedness, and takes concrete actions to promote an inclusive culture
examples: Makes space for others to participate
Created onboarding bingo
Collaborates with other engineers outside direct responsibilities
Brought shy and introverted people into a dominant conversation
Finds ways to ramp up and engage new hires quickly
Volunteered as Growth Track review assistant for a review period

steps.description: Contributes to improving team relatedness, and helps build a culture of lending support
examples: Takes on additional Watch shifts at short notice
Lead Watch cycles with little support while still contributing to projects
Pitches in to help other teams hit deadlines, without missing own deadlines
Made significant contributions to the Growth Matrix as a Category Reviewer for 1+ years
Uses position to raise difficult issues on someone's behalf
Stayed positive and improved team morale during period after layoffs

steps.description: Exemplifies selflessness for the team without compromising responsibilities, and lifts everyone up
examples: Goes above and beyond on the Watch, serving the team without complaint
Devoted large amount of time to helping outside direct responsibilities
Implements concrete programs to signficantly improve team inclusivity
Refactored hundreds of legacy Shepherd nodes
Takes on large amounts of tedious grunt work for the team without being asked
Acted as a Growth Matrix Category Owner 1+ years

steps.description: Lives the company values, guards positive culture, and defines policies that support relatedness between teams
examples: Brings separate teams together to build relatedness
Organized wine and olive tasting offsite for the whole engineering org
Holds individuals, teams, and leadership accountable to Ankorstore's values
Devised, delivered and acted on findings from an engineer happiness survey
Sets the tone, policy, and goals around maintaining an inclusive company
Challenged and corrected exclusionary behaviour or policies
